cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 25, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3327, No Congressionally Obligated Recurring Revenue Used as Pensions To Incarcerated Officials Now Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 87 (Wednesday, May 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NORMAN:
H.R. 3327.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8
[Page H2613]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: No Congressionally Obligated Recurring Revenue Used as Pensions To Incarcerated Officials Now Act
